channel.title: Need help with barrage fix
channel.description: Hey i'm stumped i tried fixing barrage for a while now and can't seem to find out how to this is my problem i'm having each time someone is barraged they can still attack you if your 3 steps near them so if i'm like two steps away from them they can still attack while theyre frozen can someone help me out please :|
